reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Catch Up Program for Children Affected by the Crisis in Yemen : Education is My Right

description.narrative:
This project aims to institutionalize the much needed for Second Education Opportunities and Catch up and Alternative Pathways Education in Yemen to support the reintegration of out of school and At risk children in schooling . The program will pilot several modalities such as One Classroom school , Summer schools and community schools to reach out for millions of children left schools because of the Crisis.
The program will develop two levels national accelerated learning content for grade 1-3 & grade 4-6 . It is expected that 25 000 children to benefit from the Program during g the first year.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Aid and Humanitarian Relief Centre

organisation.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
